vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in EtherBank.withdrawBalance (patch_9.sol#15-19):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()) (patch_9.sol#17)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- userBalances (patch_9.sol#18)
